name: Laseronium - The Reflexion
description:
Laseronium: The Reflexion is an arcade puzzle game that tests your abstract thinking and your conceptualization.

THE GOAL
Your goal in every level is to imagine a straight line that bounces of the edges of objects causing reflection. In that way, you will get that laser line to eventually hit its goal and you pass that level.

FEATURES
You are in control of deciding where the reflection cubes will be placed. But there are some special cubes as well - like the ones that don't reflect at all or the ones that can not be moved around but are fixed in your polygon.

So, activate your thinking, bring up some knowledge from your physics class and the laser party can begin.
